name: Survive The Blast 1942
description:
---------------------------------------

The objective is simple.  Survive The Blast. The player has 1 minute to find adequate cover from the blast before a nuclear bomb destroys the map.

---------------------------------------

How to play

- Use W A S D to move

- Use mouse to look around

- Use space for jump

---------------------------------------

For those who like puzzles



---------------------------------------
